TEXT: The applicants , PERSON , PERSON and Mr PERSON , who were born in DATE and DATE respectively , are all NORP nationals and they live in the district of FAC in ORG . They were represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE at CARDINAL p.m. ORG , President of ORG ( HEP ) , was taken away from his home allegedly by police officers from ORG of ORG . From the window of their house his wife , who is the first applicant , saw ORG being put in the back seat of a dark - coloured ORG estate car and immediately rang their lawyer . The lawyer called the police headquarters ; however , she was told that ORG was not detained there .

On DATE the first applicant and her lawyer contacted the police headquarters , the Governor of the emergency region , FAC , ORG of ORG , ORG of the province and the gendarmerie headquarters . All these authorities replied that they did not know anything about ORG . Police officers took a statement from the first applicant on DATE .

On DATE a body was found in LOC attached to the province of ORG . An on - site body examination was carried out by the PERSON public prosecutor and a doctor . The report noted the presence of a number of bullet entry holes on the back of the trunk of the body and exit holes on the front . The doctor stated that the cause of death was internal bleeding and brain destruction caused by trauma . As the cause of death was clearly established , it was not considered necessary to carry out a full post - mortem examination . The unidentified body was then buried in the PERSON cemetery .

On DATE , the third applicant , ORG brother , heard about the body and went to PERSON . The gendarmes showed him some clothes and he identified these clothes as those of ORG . The body was exhumed and another post - mortem examination conducted , which confirmed the findings of the previous examination . The body was handed over to the family on DATE .

The first applicant was invited to the police station on DATE respectively to give statements . On DATE , she gave a description of the people who had abducted ORG and upon this description photo fit drawings of the abductors were produced .

On DATE the applicants sent a letter to GPE 's ORG to be conveyed to ORG . In this letter , the applicants referred to the GPE report , which concluded that ORG had been killed by agents of the ORG . They asked the prosecutor to investigate these allegations and to inform the family about the outcome of the investigation . They received no reply to this letter .
On DATE the applicants repeated their submissions in a letter addressed to GPE 's ORG .
On DATE the public prosecutor attached to ORG informed the applicants that the investigation into the killing of ORG was still pending .

On DATE ORG lawyers lodged a petition with the ORG public prosecutor 's office stating that their client had been taken from his house on DATE by persons who had introduced themselves as police officers from ORG of ORG . DATE , ORG wife gave a statement at the police and maintained that her husband had been taken away from their house by CARDINAL armed men .

On DATE a body was found in LOC attached to the province of ORG . The PERSON public prosecutor and a doctor carried out an on - site body examination and established the cause of death as brain destruction and internal bleeding . The body was subsequently buried in the PERSON cemetery as its identity could not be established .

On DATE the body was identified as that of ORG and it was handed over to ORG family on DATE . A further body examination was carried out by the ORG public prosecutor 's office which confirmed the previous findings .

The ORG public prosecutor 's office commenced an investigation into the death of ORG . On CARDINAL and DATE respectively the first applicant gave statements to the police and described the persons who had abducted ORG . Statements were taken from ORG neighbours and from the officers who had found his body on DATE in PERSON .
On DATE the ORG public prosecutor declared lack of jurisdiction and transferred the file to PERSON public prosecutor . The first applicant intervened in the proceedings .
On DATE ORG reported that the bullets found in ORG body had not been used in any previous incidents .

On DATE the PERSON public prosecutor delivered a decision of non - jurisdiction and sent the file to the public prosecutor attached to ORG on the ground that ORG killing could be politically motivated .
On DATE ORG office requested ORG office that progress reports at regular intervals be submitted concerning the attempts to identify the perpetrators .

On DATE the case - file was transferred to the public prosecutor attached to ORG , who subsequently sent the file to the public prosecutor attached to ORG . Upon receipt of the file , the prosecutor requested regular progress reports from the PERSON public prosecutor .
The perpetrators of the killing of ORG still remain unknown and the investigation is pending before the ORG public prosecutor 's office .
A full description of the relevant domestic law may be found in the GPE and PERSON v. GPE decision ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , ECHR CARDINAL-III ) .
